Name: Bowman VS Zombies
About the game: BowmanVSZombies: Kill, Survive, Level Up! Please take a look at the roadmap to see the next steps for the game, which will be a wave-based and story-driven game. Grab your bow, nock your arrows, and fight to survive against waves of nasty zombies, gruesome monsters, and epic bosses who follow the orders of your worst enemy in Bowman VS Zombies ! Do your beat to survive by any and all means necessary in the different levels! Fight against different enemies, each one worse than the others! Use your skill tree and some in-game powerups to help you fight your enemies. Compare your skills to your friends with our online Leaderboard and Steam achievements ! Customize your character, buy new levels and improve your skill tree with our in-game currency system. The game is currently only a wave-based game, but it will become a story-driven and wave-based game. An online coop mode will be available, so you can fight against the enemies with your friends! More missions, and unlockables to explore! More customisations of you character. A new combo system will be implemented. The complete roadmap is available here: / If you have any questions or feedbacks, please send a message: On our steam discussion: / On our Discord server:
